name: tka-monorepo
description: The Kinetic Constructor - Desktop and Web Applications

scripts.build:all: npm run build:web && npm run build:landing && npm run build:animator && npm run build:desktop
scripts.test:all: npm run test:desktop && npm run test:web && npm run test:integration
scripts.lint:python: cd apps/desktop && black . && isort . && pylint modern/src/
scripts.lint:js: cd apps/web && npm run lint && cd ../landing && npm run lint && cd ../animator && npm run lint
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:python && npm run lint:js
